creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is a free Android app that helps you engage with the Quran.

Tarteel currently offers the following features.

Locate and Learn:

- Search the Quran by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, and transliteration of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Instantly identify a verse that is being recited and share it with friends

Recite:

- Read surahs directly from the mushaf
- Choose between Uthmani and Indo-Pak script
- Begin reciting any verse and automatically continue reading from the mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature
- Test your memorization by hiding upcoming verses using Memorization Mode

We are working on releasing these features in an upcoming version insha'Allah:

- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review.

Notes:

Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order to function properly. Please make sure you allow the app to access these permissions.
descriptionShort: Search, Read, Memorize, and Explore the meanings of Al Quran. Free for Android.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - This update includes usability improvements and bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Tarteel: Recite Al Quran

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Strengthen your relationship with the Quran this Ramadan with Tarteel’s Artificial Intelligence powered tools. Tarteel is a free Android app that helps you engage with the Quran.

Tarteel currently offers the following free features.

Locate and Learn:

- Search the Quran by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, transliteration, and tafsir of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Instantly identify a verse that is being recited and share it with friends

Recite:

- Read surahs directly from the mushaf
- Choose between Uthmani and Indo-Pak script
- Begin reciting any verse and automatically continue reading from the mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature
- Test your memorization by hiding upcoming verses using Memorization Mode

Reading Enhancement:

- Adjust font size
- Turn on and off translations and transliteration
- Pick between translations in English, French, Urdu, and Hindi as well as tafsir in English and Arabic
- Both light and dark modes are available
- Bookmarks

Tarteel also has free and paid progress tracking and habit building features:
- Create a free account to see your streak, earn badges, and have your activity synced across devices
- Purchase a premium subscription for detailed analytics and insights on your Quran sessions

We are working on releasing these features in an upcoming version insha'Allah:

- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review.

Notes:

Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure you allow the app to access these permissions.

descriptionShort: Recite, Read, Memorize, Search and Explore the Quran. Free for Android.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
** New languages **
Tarteel is now available in Indonesian and includes new Quran translations in Bengali, Farsi, Hausa, Indonesian, Malayalam, and Turkish. We've also added Tafsir Ibn Kathir in English, Bengali, and Urdu.

** New Features **
Tarteel now keeps track of your longest streak and Premium users have access to new graphs showing their Quran session time over days/weeks/months.

** Always Improving **
We've also been hard at work fixing a number of bugs and polishing the experience.

descriptionShort: Recite, Read, Memorize, Search and Explore the Quran. Free for Android.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update introduces Challenges and Reminders! Accept one of our challenges, such as reading 10 minutes every day or completing the entire Quran (khatm), or create your own. Tarteel will guide you through completing the challenge, track your progress, and send you reminders.

This update also comes with many bug fixes.

We update the app regularly to add new features and deliver the best experience. Please let us know what you think by emailing support@tarteel.ai.

- Both light and dark modes are available
- Bookmarks

Tarteel also has free and paid progress tracking and habit building features:
- Create a free account to see your streak, earn badges, and have your activity synced across devices
- Purchase a premium subscription for detailed analytics and insights on your Quran sessions

We are working on releasing these features in an upcoming version insha'Allah:

- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review.

Notes:

Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure you allow the app to access these permissions.

title: Tarteel: Recite Al Quran

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the #1 Quran application to unlock the Enlightenment of the Holy Quran through the use of Artificial Intelligence and an intuitively delightful Voice-based user experience. Recite using Tarteel to unlock a wealth of value for yourself and your Akhira. Let Tarteel’s individually tailored user experience help you achieve any of your Quranic goals related to Reading, Recitation, Memorization, Understanding and Habit Building.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and a focus on user privacy, and is made by a highly motivated and dedicated team of Muslims. Features including Voice Recitation follow along, Voice Quran Ayah search, Bookmarks, multiple Quran layouts and translation options and much more are all included for free.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Tarteel also offers an optional paid subscription that includes:

* Quran Recitation Mistake Detection - Detect your word-level mistakes while reciting or memorizing the Quran.

* Challenges - Create goals and objectives related to your Quran engagement and build habits that last you a lifetime.

* Advanced Activity Tracking - Keep track of your Quran activity and view insightful aggregate data around your Quranic habits.

* Gamification and Badges - Make interacting with the Quran more engaging and approachable for users of all ages.

—

Introducing Recitation Mistake Detection — The Quran companion in your pocket, available to assist you wherever and whenever you wish.

* With a Premium subscription, when you use the Recitation feature on Tarteel to help you memorize or track your recitation, our Quran AI companion will: highlight, notify, and log any mistakes where you add an extra word, miss a word, or recite the incorrect words.

* The Tarteel Quran Artificial Intelligence Assistant also keeps track of your past activity, mistakes, challenges, accomplishments, and recitations.

* Tajweed and Pronunciation mistakes are not currently detected by the system, but are on the long-term product roadmap. Be sure to keep us in your prayers and continue to support us to achieve this goal.

—

Core uses for Tarteel include:

* Recite:
- Mistake Detection - Highlight, notify, and log mistakes at a word level while reciting.
- Memorization - Hide Quranic ayahs and automatically reveal words as you recite them. Peak words or ayahs when you get stuck.
- Begin reciting any verse to automatically locate and continue reading from the Mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature

* Habit Building:
- Set goals for yourself based on pages, time, or completing specific sections of the Quran
- Set reminders for yourself, monitor your progress and also unlock rewards to keep you continually motivated

* Locate and Learn:
- Instantly identify a verse by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, transliteration, and tafsir of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Share the ayahs with friends

* Reading Enhancement:
- Adjust font size
- Turn on and off translations and transliteration
- Pick between translations and tafsir in English, French, Urdu, Hindi, and more
- Choose between light and dark mode
- Bookmarks

* Upcoming Features (insha'Allah):
- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review. Request features using https://feedback.tarteel.ai/

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure to allow the app to access these permissions.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/tos/
descriptionShort: Recite, Read, Memorize, Search and Explore the Quran

descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the #1 Quran application to unlock the Enlightenment of the Holy Quran through the use of Artificial Intelligence and an intuitively delightful Voice-based user experience. Recite using Tarteel to unlock a wealth of value for yourself and your Akhira. Let Tarteel’s individually tailored user experience help you achieve any of your Quranic goals related to Reading, Recitation, Memorization, Understanding and Habit Building.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and a focus on user privacy, and is made by a highly motivated and dedicated team of Muslims. Features including Voice Recitation follow along, Voice Quran Ayah search, Bookmarks, multiple Quran layouts and translation options and much more are all included for free.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Tarteel also offers an optional paid subscription that includes:

* Quran Recitation Mistake Detection - Detect your word-level mistakes while reciting or memorizing the Quran.

* Challenges - Create goals and objectives related to your Quran engagement and build habits that last you a lifetime.

* Advanced Activity Tracking - Keep track of your Quran activity and view insightful aggregate data around your Quranic habits.

* Gamification and Badges - Make interacting with the Quran more engaging and approachable for users of all ages.

—

Introducing Recitation Mistake Detection — The Quran companion in your pocket, available to assist you wherever and whenever you wish.

* With a Premium subscription, when you use the Recitation feature on Tarteel to help you memorize or track your recitation, our Quran AI companion will: highlight, notify, and log any mistakes where you add an extra word, miss a word, or recite the incorrect words.

* The Tarteel Quran Artificial Intelligence Assistant also keeps track of your past activity, mistakes, challenges, accomplishments, and recitations.

* Tajweed and Pronunciation mistakes are not currently detected by the system, but are on the long-term product roadmap. Be sure to keep us in your prayers and continue to support us to achieve this goal.

—

Core uses for Tarteel include:

* Recite:
- Mistake Detection - Highlight, notify, and log mistakes at a word level while reciting.
- Memorization - Hide Quranic ayahs and automatically reveal words as you recite them. Peak words or ayahs when you get stuck.
- Begin reciting any verse to automatically locate and continue reading from the Mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature

* Habit Building:
- Set goals for yourself based on pages, time, or completing specific sections of the Quran
- Set reminders for yourself, monitor your progress and also unlock rewards to keep you continually motivated

* Locate and Learn:
- Instantly identify a verse by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, transliteration, and tafsir of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Share the ayahs with friends

* Reading Enhancement:
- Adjust font size
- Turn on and off translations and transliteration
- Pick between translations and tafsir in English, French, Urdu, Hindi, and more
- Choose between light and dark mode
- Bookmarks

* Upcoming Features (insha'Allah):
- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review. Request features using https://feedback.tarteel.ai/

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure to allow the app to access these permissions.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/tos/
descriptionShort: Recite, Read, Memorize, Search and Explore the Quran

title: Tarteel: Quran A.I.

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the #1 Quran application to unlock the Enlightenment of the Holy Quran through the use of Artificial Intelligence and an intuitively delightful Voice-based user experience. Recite using Tarteel to unlock a wealth of value for yourself and your Akhira. Let Tarteel’s individually tailored user experience help you achieve any of your Quranic goals related to Reading, Recitation, Memorization, Understanding and Habit Building.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and a focus on user privacy, and is made by a highly motivated and dedicated team of Muslims. Features including Voice Recitation follow along, Voice Quran Ayah search, Bookmarks, multiple Quran layouts and translation options and much more are all included for free.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Tarteel also offers an optional paid subscription that includes:

* Quran Recitation Mistake Detection - Detect your word-level mistakes while reciting or memorizing the Quran.

* Challenges - Create goals and objectives related to your Quran engagement and build habits that last you a lifetime.

* Advanced Activity Tracking - Keep track of your Quran activity and view insightful aggregate data around your Quranic habits.

* Gamification and Badges - Make interacting with the Quran more engaging and approachable for users of all ages.

—

Introducing Recitation Mistake Detection — The Quran companion in your pocket, available to assist you wherever and whenever you wish.

* With a Premium subscription, when you use the Recitation feature on Tarteel to help you memorize or track your recitation, our Quran AI companion will: highlight, notify, and log any mistakes where you add an extra word, miss a word, or recite the incorrect words.

* The Tarteel Quran Artificial Intelligence Assistant also keeps track of your past activity, mistakes, challenges, accomplishments, and recitations.

* Tajweed and Pronunciation mistakes are not currently detected by the system, but are on the long-term product roadmap. Be sure to keep us in your prayers and continue to support us to achieve this goal.

—

Core uses for Tarteel include:

* Recite:
- Mistake Detection - Highlight, notify, and log mistakes at a word level while reciting.
- Memorization - Hide Quranic ayahs and automatically reveal words as you recite them. Peak words or ayahs when you get stuck.
- Begin reciting any verse to automatically locate and continue reading from the Mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature

* Habit Building:
- Set goals for yourself based on pages, time, or completing specific sections of the Quran
- Set reminders for yourself, monitor your progress and also unlock rewards to keep you continually motivated

* Locate and Learn:
- Instantly identify a verse by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, transliteration, and tafsir of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Share the ayahs with friends

* Reading Enhancement:
- Adjust font size
- Turn on and off translations and transliteration
- Pick between translations and tafsir in English, French, Urdu, Hindi, and more
- Choose between light and dark mode
- Bookmarks

* Upcoming Features (insha'Allah):
- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review. Request features using https://feedback.tarteel.ai/

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure to allow the app to access these permissions.

title: Tarteel: Quran A.I.

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the #1 Quran application to unlock the Enlightenment of the Holy Quran through the use of Artificial Intelligence and an intuitively delightful Voice-based user experience. Recite using Tarteel to unlock a wealth of value for yourself and your Akhira. Let Tarteel’s individually tailored user experience help you achieve any of your Quranic goals related to Reading, Recitation, Memorization, Understanding and Habit Building.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and a focus on user privacy, and is made by a highly motivated and dedicated team of Muslims. Features including Voice Recitation follow along, Voice Quran Ayah search, Bookmarks, multiple Quran layouts and translation options and much more are all included for free.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Tarteel also offers an optional paid subscription that includes:

* Quran Recitation Mistake Detection - Detect your word-level mistakes while reciting or memorizing the Quran.

* Challenges - Create goals and objectives related to your Quran engagement and build habits that last you a lifetime.

* Advanced Activity Tracking - Keep track of your Quran activity and view insightful aggregate data around your Quranic habits.

* Gamification and Badges - Make interacting with the Quran more engaging and approachable for users of all ages.

—

Introducing Recitation Mistake Detection — The Quran companion in your pocket, available to assist you wherever and whenever you wish.

* With a Premium subscription, when you use the Recitation feature on Tarteel to help you memorize or track your recitation, our Quran AI companion will: highlight, notify, and log any mistakes where you add an extra word, miss a word, or recite the incorrect words.

* The Tarteel Quran Artificial Intelligence Assistant also keeps track of your past activity, mistakes, challenges, accomplishments, and recitations.

* Tajweed and Pronunciation mistakes are not currently detected by the system, but are on the long-term product roadmap. Be sure to keep us in your prayers and continue to support us to achieve this goal.

—

Core uses for Tarteel include:

* Recite:
- Mistake Detection - Highlight, notify, and log mistakes at a word level while reciting.
- Memorization - Hide Quranic ayahs and automatically reveal words as you recite them. Peak words or ayahs when you get stuck.
- Begin reciting any verse to automatically locate and continue reading from the Mushaf using Tarteel's Recite feature

* Habit Building:
- Set goals for yourself based on pages, time, or completing specific sections of the Quran
- Set reminders for yourself, monitor your progress and also unlock rewards to keep you continually motivated

* Locate and Learn:
- Instantly identify a verse by reciting a full ayah, part of an ayah, or even a single word
- View the Arabic, translation, transliteration, and tafsir of the ayahs that you search
- See where the ayahs or phrases that you search appear in the mushaf
- Share the ayahs with friends

* Reading Enhancement:
- Adjust font size
- Turn on and off translations and transliteration
- Pick between translations and tafsir in English, French, Urdu, Hindi, and more
- Choose between light and dark mode
- Bookmarks

* Upcoming Features (insha'Allah):
- Audio playback for your recitation
- Ability to listen to recitations by various reciters
- Additional languages and translations
- Advanced features to make Quran memorization easier

We would love to hear your feedback as we work to continue to improve the app. If you have benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review. Request features using https://feedback.tarteel.ai/

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please make sure to allow the app to access these permissions.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/tos/

title: Tarteel: Quran A.I.

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Achieve all of your Quran goals this Ramadan with Tarteel! Ramadan is the month of the Quran, and there’s no better time to strengthen your bond with the words of Allah than this blessed month. Tarteel is here to help; let it guide you towards reading, reciting, memorizing and understanding the Quran with confidence using just your voice. Simply tap the microphone, recite, and watch the verses appear on the screen in front of you.

Tarteel is the world’s first AI-powered Quran platform and just what you need to develop your Quran engagement. Using intuitive artificial intelligence, Tarteel creates an experience tailored to you, interacting with your recitation to help you make that deep connection with the Quran and maintain it. It’s ready to listen and follow along at home, in class, during Taraweeh and everywhere else. Improve your memorization, boost your confidence and build habits that will remain throughout Ramadan and beyond!

Take part in Tarteel’s Recite a Quran, Give a Quran Challenge this Ramadan for a chance to share the reward! Recite 70% or more of the Quran using Tarteel’s tracking feature and we’ll donate a Quran on your behalf!

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team is led by Islamic values and a passion for using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

—

TARTEEL PREMIUM

For a limited time only this Ramadan, grab a Lifetime Offer and gain unlimited access to Tarteel Premium for a one-time payment of $250! Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we are working towards incorporating them into Tarteel in due course.

- Advanced Memorization Mode

Hide the script and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Audio Playback

Listen to your own recitation and pinpoint where you need to improve.

- Challenges

Create goals related to your engagement with the Quran and start building lifelong habits.

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement.

—

Join the 500,000 and counting who are using Tarteel to strengthen their relationship with the Quran this Ramadan!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: http://feedback.tarteel.ai

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/
descriptionShort: Your Quran Companion This Ramadan

title: Tarteel: Quran A.I.

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the world’s first AI-powered Quran app and just what you need to further your Quran journey. You’re one tap away from engaging with the words of Allah like never before, and all you need is your voice. Tap the microphone, recite, and watch the verses appear in front of you.

Using intuitive artificial intelligence, Tarteel unlocks the Quran and creates a tailored experience for its user, interacting with your recitation and keeping track of your activity to accommodate your working patterns and goals. Think of it as your very own assistant, ready to listen and connect you with the Quran anytime, anywhere. Tarteel exists to help every user make a deep connection with the Quran and maintain it. Improve your recitation, boost your confidence and build habits that last a lifetime.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team is led by Islamic values and a passion for using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

—

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Advance your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we are working towards incorporating them into Tarteel in due course.

- Advanced Memorization Mode

Hide the script and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Audio Playback

Listen to your own recitation and pinpoint where you need to improve.

- Challenges

Create goals related to your engagement with the Quran and start building lifelong habits.

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement.

—

Join the 500,000 and counting who are using Tarteel to strengthen their relationship with the Quran!

title: Tarteel: Quran A.I.

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Tarteel is the world’s first AI-powered Quran app and just what you need to further your Quran journey. You’re one tap away from engaging with the words of Allah like never before, and all you need is your voice. Tap the microphone, recite, and watch the verses appear in front of you.

Using intuitive artificial intelligence, Tarteel unlocks the Quran and creates a tailored experience for its user, interacting with your recitation and keeping track of your activity to accommodate your working patterns and goals. Think of it as your very own assistant, ready to listen and connect you with the Quran anytime, anywhere. Tarteel exists to help every user make a deep connection with the Quran and maintain it. Improve your recitation, boost your confidence and build habits that last a lifetime.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team is led by Islamic values and a passion for using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

—

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Advance your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we are working towards incorporating them into Tarteel in due course.

- Advanced Memorization Mode

Hide the script and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Audio Playback

Listen to your own recitation and pinpoint where you need to improve.

- Challenges

Create goals related to your engagement with the Quran and start building lifelong habits.

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement.

—

Join the 500,000 and counting who are using Tarteel to strengthen their relationship with the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: http://feedback.tarteel.ai

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

Using intuitive artificial intelligence, Tarteel unlocks the Quran and creates a tailored experience for its user, interacting with your recitation and keeping track of your activity to accommodate your working patterns and goals. Think of it as your very own assistant, ready to listen and connect you with the Quran anytime, anywhere. Tarteel exists to help every user make a deep connection with the Quran and maintain it. Improve your recitation, boost your confidence and build habits that last a lifetime.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team is led by Islamic values and a passion for using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

—

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Advance your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we are working towards incorporating them into Tarteel in due course.

- Advanced Memorization Mode

Hide the script and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Audio Playback

Listen to your own recitation and pinpoint where you need to improve.

- Challenges

Create goals related to your engagement with the Quran and start building lifelong habits.

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement.

—

Join the 500,000 and counting who are using Tarteel to strengthen their relationship with the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: http://feedback.tarteel.ai

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/
descriptionShort: Your A.I. Quran Companion

title:
Tarteel - ترتيل | Quran App
5.46.2

creator: Tarteel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Remember when you said you wanted to memorize more of the Quran? We do.

Transform your Quran memorization journey with Tarteel, the world’s first A.I-powered Quran app designed to help you memorize smarter and connect deeper. With your voice, you’re one tap away from engaging with the words of Allah in a way that’s never been done before. Tap the mic, recite, and watch the verses appear in front of you. And if you make a mistake, Tarteel will alert you in real time with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection.

Busy? You can use Tarteel on your own time.

Shy? Practice independently with Tarteel until you’re ready to recite to someone.

Don’t know where to start? Anywhere you feel comfortable - we recommend Juz Amma.

Need Support? Tarteel works alongside your pace, goals and schedule.

Worried it’s too late? It’s NEVER too late.

Tarteel’s advanced A.I adapts to your recitation, tracking your progress and aligning with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and cultivate habits that last a lifetime, anytime, anywhere, no matter where you are in your memorization journey.

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team is led by Islamic values and a passion for using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

**TARTEEL PREMIUM**

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work.

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen.

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement.

—

Join the 9M and counting who are using Tarteel to strengthen their memorization of the Quran!
